title: Lower try? await cancellation conversion to a stable non-throwing empty-result contract
feature: cancellation optionalization and task-context lowering invariants

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: try? await lowering catches cancellation throws from cancellation points and converts them to the optional empty result
conversion to empty result occurs without rethrowing cancellation through the non-throwing caller
current task context remains queryable after the optionalizing conversion path completes
runtime_assertions: can05_try_optionalize returns nil when can05_throwing_cancellation_point throws cancellation

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized lowering preserves cancellation-to-empty-result conversion behavior for try? await
optimization does not transform the non-throwing optionalized path into a rethrowing path
task-context handling around cancellation conversion remains equivalent to -O0
runtime_assertions: optimized lowering does not report cancellation as successful non-empty completion

abi_field_stability.required_shape: try? await converts cancellation throws into the operator empty result without changing caller non-throwing effect shape
